Name: 拯救大魔王重生 Falsemen: Demon Rebirth
About the game: Humanity has become the dominant force in the world, and the devils are living under the cover of their names... Are you really willing? The world is being dominated by evil human beings! In this game you can experience: 1. Unusual plot and world outlook. 2. Lead four characters to conquer mazes and checkpoints. 3. Operating with different enemies in the tower. 4. Choose the opponent you are about to encounter and the one you don't want to encounter. You can operate the game like this: 1. Enter full screen mode and exit through F4. 2. Move the position of the person by clicking on the direction key or the mouse. 3. Determine your choice by using the Enter key or the left mouse button. 4. Layout your rounds in battle through the Skills Panel. 5. Combat efficiently by remembering commands. Why did we make this game: Falsemen: Demon Rebirth is a complete reproduction of Rescue the Great Demon. The original is a personal game created by Yesenmidnight in June 2015. The rebirth edition retains the elements of 'tower' and 'floor' in the original edition, and has been completely reproduced in the plot, characters, art, music, procedures and other aspects. Falsemen DR is a pre-production of Falsemen III, which is about to meet with you. In order to let you better understand the game world outlook, we have made this re-creation. On the other hand, this creation is also to solve the shortfall of funds for the development of Falsemen III. For Now, we've spent all our money. All the revenue from the sale of Falsemen DR will be used for the development of Falsemen III. Wish you enjoy our game.
